name: CORRIDORS (arkodsko)
description:
CORRIDORS is a horror 3d game, created and published by Arkodsko

powered by PANDAKO's WithThreeJS 3D extension for Gdevelop

You woke up not knowing where, and you have to find a way out of this corridor, where at any moment, someone can come out of the corner of the room...

LOUD SOUNDS! ;; CURRENTLY IN BETA STAGE

This game contains jump scares and is not recommended for people who are scared easily. Additionally, if you dislike or find discomfort in being alone in a dark room,or have claustrophobia, this is also not recommended. but at the same time, you could enjoy these fears if you choose.
